name: Salesline

”Alexa, open sales line”

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sales line
des:
Salesline for Alexa allows you to connect your Salesforce dashboards with a few clicks. In moments, you can be asking Alexa for the key information you care about in your Salesforce dashboards. Once connected to a dashboard, Salesline will always have the latest information so that you can "Just Ask"!

Features:

- Connect multiple Salesforce dashboards

- Ask Alexa for any data in the connected dashboards. For example, "Alexa, ask Salesline for pipeline", "Alexa, ask Salesline for the top salesperson", "Alexa, ask Salesline for open opportunities", etc. Whatever you need to know, she'll tell you!

- Create custom briefings combining text with any data from the connected dashboards. Use the powerful briefing editor to make it sound exactly the way you want!


To Connect your Salesforce Dashboard:

1. Click "Enable" to enable this skill and link it with your Salesforce account
2. Go to https://www.talktosalesforce.com and click the "Get Started" button.
3. Log in with your Salesforce account, if prompted, and follow any prompts to authorize.
4. Click the "Connect to Salesforce" button and follow any prompts to authorize.
5. Follow the setup screens to voice-enable your first dashboard and create a voice briefing.
6. Once saved, your dashboards data is now connected and your voice briefing is ready. You can always click "Add Briefing" to create more briefings.
7. Say, "Alexa, Salesline" to hear your default briefing. Say, "Alexa, ask Salesline for _____" to ask for any other briefings or for specific data elements from your dashboard.

Powered by Voice Metrics

Updates for this version:
- APL Support
